adrFormatAddress: 247 3rd Ave #404, New York, NY 10010, USA

originalText.text: Dr Rousso did an excellent job.  He is poised and professional. He is clearly experienced and knowledgeable in his field. I recommend him without hesitation to anyone interested in facial cosmetic procedures.

text.text: Dr Rousso did an excellent job.  He is poised and professional. He is clearly experienced and knowledgeable in his field. I recommend him without hesitation to anyone interested in facial cosmetic procedures.

originalText.text:
Dr. Rousso is a fantastic surgeon. I had two surgeries done by Dr. Rousso, and throughout both surgeries, Dr. Rousso was beyond kind and professional. He addressed my breathing issues and the areas of my nose that I was unhappy with from an aesthetic perspective.

After my surgeries, I had various questions for Dr. Rousso. I recovered during Christmas and Hanukkah, and immediately after reaching out to Dr. Rousso (while most doctors are out of their offices), he emailed and called me to answer my questions and monitor my recovery. Anytime I contacted Dr. Rousso, he was there for me.

I am so happy with the results of my surgeries done by Dr. Rousso. I am breathing better and love the look of my new nose. Because of my experience, my sister already anticipates scheduling a consultation with Dr. Rousso to discuss her options for a similar procedure. I recommend Dr. Rousso to anyone searching for a surgeon who is both highly medically knowledgeable and, at the same time, has an eye for aesthetics.

Thank you, Doc!

originalText.text: Dr. Rousso was the absolute rudest and most unwelcoming doctor I have ever visited. He cut me off mid-sentence several times and clearly got offended when I told him what the previous ENT doctors had told me I needed for my septum deviation (which he did not agree with). Very unprofessionally discredited and berated a previous ENT doctor I had seen. Abruptly ended my consultation by opening the door and gesturing me out. Charged my insurance company $6300!

originalText.text: Great doctor!!! I highly recommend this doctor because he was so patient, kind, and reassuring about my son's surgery. He also did an amazing job with my son's surgery, there were no scaring or any damages.

text.text: Great doctor!!! I highly recommend this doctor because he was so patient, kind, and reassuring about my son's surgery. He also did an amazing job with my son's surgery, there were no scaring or any damages.

originalText.text: I went to Dr. Rousso after a nasal fracture and I can’t recommend him enough. He operates with compassion, patience, and most of all he prioritizes the integrity of patient care above profits. His office is calm and clean, and his receptionist was polite and kind. He’s also extremely knowledgeable, and this comes through in the way he thinks through various facets of care.
